item.title: Introduction to libdiary üìñüîê
item.description: After a few weeks of coding, I’m finally completed the initial release of a very special (not really) project that I would like to share with the world. Today, I am proud to introduce libdiary - a C library designed for managing portable encrypted diaries. Throwback Pursuing a master’s degree in computer science comes with certain implications, one of them being the diploma project. Fortunately, being a venture-minded individual (or at least thinking this way), I decided to try to make something special of it.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: So, I finally decided to create my own blog. The reason? Idk. But hopefully, I’ll make use of it soon…
